meanings.definition: Resembling a pump in appearance or function.
meanings.sent1: The machine had a pumplike shape with a long handle.
meanings.sent2: The water fountain had a pumplike mechanism to draw water.
meanings.sent3: The pumplike toy made the children giggle as they played with it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was pumplike, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The pumplike sound of the old clock echoed through the house.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of a pump.
meanings.sent1: The pumplike device efficiently moved the liquid from one container to another.
meanings.sent2: The inflatable mattress had a pumplike feature for easy inflation.
meanings.sent3: The pumplike motion of his arms while dancing was comical to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was pumplike, never giving up no matter the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The pumplike force of the waterfall was mesmerizing to behold.
